description:
Cute Little App to Add Life to Photos. Lots of cute stickers to decorate your photos with! 

User:
Whoa. This is one of my favorite photo apps on iPhone! 


PicToon! is a photo application to decorate iPhone photos. Do you want to make your photos more fun and cooler? Try this! 


======= Features ======= 

Camera / Photo library  
Run "PicToon!" and select the 'Take' or 'Load' Button. When you take a Photo with the front facing camera, then "PicToon!" will show the photo in real-time view image (not horizontally reversed!). 


Various filters 
① BRIGHT, ② B4 SUNSET, ③ HARI PANAS, ④ RETRO, ⑤ VERDE ROSA, ⑥ MERAH, ⑦ HELADO, ⑧ BLACK & WHITE, ⑨ TOON 
Just touch any filter to make your photo more beautiful! You can make your photo funnier and nicer with easy and simple way. Various Filters will be updated continuously. 


Frames
There are 24 various and unique frames that you can use to decorate your Photos! The frames will be updated continually. If you need any special frames or have a good idea, please feel free to contact us : app@cultstory.com 


Bubble (Text balloon)
Do you want to add any text to your photos? Do this with Bubble! Your photos will be more fun. 
The text and bubble color can be selected with the color rolling board and resized with pinch. 


Lots of stickers
In this version, 50 stickers was added. Now "PicToon!" has 150 various stickers. Attach appropriate stickers to your photo.! 


Twitter, Facebook 
Are you a Facebook or Twitter user? Send your photos to your favorite SNS. 


Twitter gallery 
The photos sended to Twitter will be displayed in the Twitter gallery. Do you want to share your photos? Then send the photos to Twitter with #PicToon.
